review_data.title: Delicious

review_data.title: Cheeseburger with fries.
review_data.content: I got a takeaway. The service is absolutely excellent got my preset in under 10 min. The burger, exactly — what I wanted. Not greasy cheeseburger where everything is full of liquid (sauce), but everything stayed together so well and it was so, so delicious!

review_data.title: So good!
review_data.content: Great burger and sweet potato fries! Try the Mediterranean burger. So so Good! Ate outside and had a great time.

review_data.title: Magnificent place
review_data.content: We enjoyed two burgers and sweet potato fries, all simply fantastic. The burgers were perfectly cooked, perfectly flavoured and the fries were wonderful. The owner himself took his time to converse and share his true passion about the place and their food.

review_data.title: Great burger and even better cheesecase
